name: The Unknown To Be Known 3.0
description:
This game was inspired by Undertale quite some time ago and the first to versions were absolutely bad so here's the new and improved version that may actually end up to be finished (if you save, you'll have to go into the files to restart). Thanks to the people who helped me on the Okey Collective (your names/usernames will be in the credits). More to come :)

Arrow keys - Z - X

DON'T SAVE! IT MAY CRASH THE GAME!!!
